venue.address_1: 70 Worcester Providence Turnpike the shops at Blackstone valley
venue.name: Blackstone valley Cinema 14

item.description:
"Inglourious Basterds" is Quentin Tarantino's new WWII film with Brad Pitt. It looks like over-the-top violent fun. Here's the IMDb page: http://www.imdb.com/t...

The movie is playing at Blackstone Valley in Millbury at 7:15 PM. Let's meet around 7:00. I'll be the guy with glasses, a goatee, and a Superman cap. Call my cell phone if you need anything: 508-981-0455.

After the movie, we can hang out at one of the many restaurants in the area. Maybe drinks and snacks at Longhorn?

- David
item.how_to_find_us: I have glasses, a goatee, and a Superman cap.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Inglourious Basterds - 7:00 PM on Saturday
